title: Message of Sympathy on the Death of Hugh Campbell Wallace.
text:
My dear Mrs. Wallace:

I was deeply grieved to learn yesterday of the death of your husband. Both Mrs. Hoover and I wish you to know of our sincere sympathy in your great loss. Yours faithfully,

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [Mrs. Hugh Wallace, 1800 Massachusetts Avenue, Washington, D.C.]
